Mantan Ketua Pansel KPK : Dewas Tak Boleh Terkait Kepentingan Politik Tertentu
01 Nov 2019, 20:42 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Mantan Ketua Pansel KPK : Dewas Tak Boleh Terkait Kepentingan Politik Tertentu

KBRN, Jakarta : Mantan Ketua Panitia Seleksi (Pansel) Calon Pimpinan (Capim) Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK), Yenti Garnasih mengingatkan, Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK tak boleh terafiliasi dengan partai politik atau kepentingan tertentu."Mereka (Dewas KPK) itu tidak boleh lagi ada kaitannya dengan kepentingan tertentu. Termasuk kepentingan partai politik," tegasnya saat berbincang dengan Radio Republik Indonesia, Jumat (1/11/2019).Pasalnya menurut dia, Dewas KPK bertugas untuk menjaga independensi dari pelaksanaan pemberantasan korupsi yang dilakukan oleh komisi anti rasuah."Dia harus menjaga independensi penegakan hukum," tegasnya."Harusnya seperti itu. Karena penegakan hukum. Kita bicara penegakan hukum," lanjutnya.Sebelumnya, Presiden RI Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyatakan akan melantik Dewas KPK pada Desember 2019 nanti. Langkah itu sesuai dengan UU KPK Nomor 19 Tahun 2019. (Foto : Tangkap Layar I-news TV)

Former KPK Chairperson: Dewas Should Not Be Related to Specific Political Interests
Nov 1 2019, 20:42 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Former KPK Chairperson: Dewas Should Not Be Related to Specific Political Interests

KBRN, Jakarta: Former Chairman of the Selection Committee (Pansel) Candidates for the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK), Yenti Garnasih reminded, the KPK Supervisory Board (Dewas) should not be affiliated with certain political parties or interests. "They (Dewas KPK) no longer should be related to specific interests. Including the interests of political parties, "he stressed when talking with Radio Republik Indonesia, Friday (11/01/2019). According to him, Dewas KPK was tasked with maintaining independence from the implementation of corruption eradication carried out by the commission "He must maintain the independence of law enforcement," he said. "It should be like that. Because of law enforcement. We are talking about law enforcement," he continued. Previously, Indonesian President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) said he would appoint Dewas KPK in December 2019. The move is in accordance with KPK Law Number 19 of 2019. (Photo: Screenshot of I-news TV)
